title: John
body:
John: Hello, Norra. 
Norra: Hi, Ed!
John: Are you enjoying yourself?
-> Yes, I'm having so much fun!
    John: Good. 
-> Not yet.
    John: Oh dear. Well, I hope you start having fun soon.
John: You can help me, if you like. 
John: I'm still working on cleaning up the edges of the flower beds.
John: You can rake up the bits of grass
John: and put them in the wheelbarrow. 
[[Okay!|John.Help]]
[[Sorry, I can't right now.|John.Exit]]

title: John.Tutorial
body:
<<if visited ("John.Tutorial") is false>>
John: Well, Norra, we are certainly pleased to have you. 
John: The estate team can always use more volunteers.
John: I think you will enjoy working here.
John: The grounds are beautiful place to work, 
John: and sometimes a little magical, too.
[[Who are you?|John.Introduction]]
[[Where am I?|John.Location]]
<<else>>
[[John.Rake]]
<<endif>>

title: John.Introduction
body:
John: Have you forgotten already?
John: My name is Edwin.
John: I'm the head gardener here at the castle.
John: But you can call me Ed.
[[John.Location]]

title: John.Location
body:
John: We're in the lower garden right now. 
John: Just up there is the rose garden. 
John: Why don't you walk around and explore a little bit.

title: John.Leave
body:
John: Norra, you can't leave yet!
John: We need to finish edging this flower bed.
[[John.Rake]]

title: John.Rake
body:
<<if $have_watering_can is false>>
John: Pick up that watering can over there,
<<else>>
John: Use that watering can you picked up,
<<endif>>
John: and water those plants over there. They'll grow a little when you've done enough.

title: John.Watered
body:
<<if $plants_watered is true>>
<<if visited ("John.Thanks") is false>>
[[John.Thanks]]
<<endif>>
John: Why don't you go see if anyone else needs your help?
<<else>>
John: Just use the watering can on those three plants over there. 
John: The soil will get darker, and each plant will grow when you're done.
<<endif>>

title: John.Thanks
body:
John: That looks great, Norra!
John: Thanks for your help. 
[[John.Watered]]
